comment: Shes a grad student. Super duper chill. She is very understanding.

Definitely one of my favorite professors I've ever had. Prof. Bishop is very caring and very clear in what she expects. The work load is not bad but still enough to where you understand the content. She responds quickly to emails and is understanding when it comes to doctors excuses, etc. Would definitely recommned!

She makes class very simple for students because she knows what it's like being a student. She only makes sure you know what is necessary for the tests, and gives you what info to write down on your notecard for the tests.

She was a good professor! Knew what she was talking about and basically went over the test and quizzes before you took them! The worst part was the connect math! She extended some due dates and was understanding about most everything!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I absolutely love prof. Bishop! I hate math and especially stat. She explains the information very well. I struggled because I have a hard time with math, but she definitely made this class manageable. She lets you have a notecard for test. She also gives a lot of opportunities for extra credit.

Professor Bishop is amazing, by far the best math professor I've ever had. She explains herself thoroughly and leaves no room for confusion. She understands that you have other classes and doesn't put too heavy of a load on you. The homework and tests are easy to understand if you pay attention to her lectures.
I usually hate math but she was so easy to understand and get along with. I am also horrible with statistics but she does a great job helping you!

She understands that she is not your only class and will go easy on you if you have a reasonable excuse. As long as you show up to class and do the work which is not the difficult to complete you will pass. Plus she rounds up grades and allows you to have a note card for each exam.

She is AMAZING! She truly wants her students to succeed and is always willing to help. You get an index card cheat sheet for each test. Best professor I have had so far. I am not the best at math but she helped me understand it so easily! TAKE HER!

Sounds cliché but literally just come to class and easy A or high B. Extra credit given the day after tests AND we have a index card cheat sheet for formulas to use for the tests. She cares so much about us as she was a KSU student just like us and knows the struggle lol. Overall, great teacher! P.S Rachael- learn to use technology ��

Class is fairly easy. Show up, take notes and it is an easy A. Homework is online, I would usually knock it out in an hour the day it was due. Gives partial credit if youre relatively close. Classes are never full length. Made Stats very easy.

THE BEST!!!!! She is so understanding and truly wants her students to succeed. Gives a lot of extra credit and class is never the full length. By far my favorite professor. Answers questions with no hesitation.

Awesome professor. Gives a ton of extra credit and provides all opportunity to do well. If you show up to class and pay attention to her lectures, you'll for sure get an A. I've never been good at math before, but she made statistics enjoyable.
